Package io.atomix.primitive.operation

Provides classes and interfaces for defining distributed primitive operations.

See: Description

    OperationId
    Raft operation identifier.

Package io.atomix.primitive.operation Description

Provides classes and interfaces for defining distributed primitive operations.
